name: Osiris (itch) (JustinTime4246)
description:
Inspired by the legend of Osiris; after being murdered by his brother Set, Osiris' body parts were scattered everywhere across Egypt. Play as his wife Eset and find the 13 pieces to reassemble her lost love. Travel through the 8 levels in our 2D platformer, made for ZenoJam 2021.

Controls: A (left), D (right), shift (glide), space (jump), E (shoot)

Made by Daylee Stratford, Kraig Denny, and Justin Orringer with moral support from Zack Huggins
